com.jme3.bullet.animation

Class IKJoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.bullet.animation.IKJoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class IKJoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, com.jme3.export.Savable
    A Constraint used for inverse kinematics (as opposed to joining bones and/or attachments).
